DOC.brief_title: The Effects Virtual Reality Upper Extremity Function Hemiplegic Cerebral Palsy
DOC.detailed_description: The current study prospective , randomize control interventional trial , conduct Istanbul University Istanbul Faculty Medicine 2016 . The study approve Ethics Committee conformity Declaration Helsinki . Prior data collection , participant provide informed consent . By order application outpatient clinic , eligible participant randomly allocate two group use computer-generated random number : intervention group ( n=17 ) control group ( n=17 ) . Information demographic characteristic ( age , gender , body mass index , educational level ) , pre-natal history , parent educational level past medical history obtain baseline assessment . After baseline assessment , patient intervention group participate computer base virtual reality exercise program HandTutor equipment . The supervised intervention program consist forty-minute exercise session three time week 8 week . In addition , patient receive home exercise program . The patient control group receive home exercise program 8 week . The home exercise program consist different game exercise range motion , stretch , strengthen exercise hand . All patient evaluate treatment , immediately treatment , 3 month end treatment .
